text: Celestron is a company that makes telescopes, microscopes, and binoculars. The main office of Celestron is in Torrance, California. == Optical instruments == === Telescopes === Celestron makes refractors, and reflectors. The telescopes of Celestron are usually from 2 inches up to 10 inches of aperture. == Other websites == *https://www.celestron.com/?srsltid=AfmBOoop6HzAnn9kogS1SLxnggeCa555Goh0XIF3mRqNx7gjC8zL8c8V Category:Technology companies
title: Celestron
